page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF ASHDON.
page.content: { Ashdon}is a small village situated in the North-west corner of Essex.It lies very close to the borders of three counties,Essex,Cambridgeshire and Suffolk.The village centre is sheltered in the valley of the tiny river Bourne,one of the headwaters of the river Cam. The original village grew up approximately one mile S.W of the present centre which is at Crown Hill at the junction of the Saffron Walden and Radwinter roads. The adult population,in Spring 1985 was 604 . The total population including children is estimated to be 750.
